S04n395:4: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ |
S04n395:6: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti ?
S04n395:7: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
S04n395:11: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
S04n395:13: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04n395:14: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04n395:19: lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paramaśobhanīyāni prādurbhūtāni ||
S04n395:20: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ?
S04n395:21: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati |
S04n395:23: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo'sti |
S04n395:30: dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti–mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04n395:35: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
S04n395:37: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ |
S04n395:38: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati–śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ |
S04n395:39: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,
S04n395:43: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum,
S04n395:44: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n395:45: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04n395:46: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n395:47: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne dhārayeyuḥ,
S04n395:49: te'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti sma,
S04n395:51: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam,
S04n395:52: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
S04n395:55: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham |
S04n395:56: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
S04n395:57: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati ||
S04n395:58: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan–ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04n395:60: sa āha–aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati |
S04n395:65: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti |
S04n395:70: tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti |
S04n395:75: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti |
S04n395:76: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n395:77: ye'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04n395:78: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti |
S04n395:83: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati |
S04n395:84: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam |
S04n395:87: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?)
S04n395:90: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān |
S04n395:91: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
S04n395:96: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti–ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
S04n395:99: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ |
S04n395:102: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat–anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni |
S04n395:103: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ |
S04n395:104: te parasparamevamāhuḥ–gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
S04n395:107: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ |
S04n395:108: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma |
S04n395:111: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ ||
